name: Shaiba'
description:
Shaiba is a 2 player space action game where you have to create a universe by bringing elements to your black hole with a specific recipe. A white hole generates random elements. You must find and drag the correct ones to your black hole before your opponent.

The game is tested with Xbox 360 and Xbox One controllers.

Controls:

  • Left Joystick: Rotate Left/Right
  • A: Thrust
  • LT: Pull Beam
  • RT: Push Beam

This game is unfinished.

Shaiba is our entry for the CIC-IPN Game Jam 2018. We were awarded with an appreciation for Art and Design by the event jury;

Known Issues:

  • Push Beam is not correctly working
  • Sometimes controllers' triggers get swapped between controllers, (just unplug and plug controllers while running the game)
  • If you use pull or push beam near the white hole, the item collider and rigidbody is lost causing the item to stay glitched forever.
